mapper.sql: XYDM, NAME, ZTLX, HYFL, ZZXS, JYZT, FR, LXDH, MAIL, DJJG, JYDZ, LLR, QYBM, QYMC
mapper.insert: insert into T_SCZT (XYDM, NAME, ZTLX, HYFL, ZZXS, JYZT, FR, LXDH, MAIL, DJJG, JYDZ, LLR, QYBM, QYMC) values (#{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ztlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hyfl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zzxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jyzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qybm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into T_SCZT
XYDM,
NAME,
ZTLX,
HYFL,
ZZXS,
JYZT,
FR,
LXDH,
MAIL,
DJJG,
JYDZ,
LLR,
QYBM,
QYMC,

#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ztlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{hyfl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{zzxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{jyzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update T_SCZT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZTLX = #{ztlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HYFL = #{hyfl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZZXS = #{zzxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JYZT = #{jyzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FR = #{fr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LXDH = #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIL = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DJJG = #{djjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JYDZ = #{jydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLR = #{llr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QYBM = #{qybm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QYMC = #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SCZT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZTLX = #{ztlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HYFL = #{hyfl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZZXS = #{zzxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JYZT = #{jyzt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FR = #{fr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LXDH = #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIL = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJJG = #{djjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JYDZ = #{jydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLR = #{llr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QYBM = #{qybm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QYMC = #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
,(select count(1) from t_hcrw b where b.hcdw_xydm=t_sczt.xydm) hcrws from T_SCZT where 1=1
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b where b.qybm = #{qybm} and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm)
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b where b.hcjg like #{dwId}||'%' and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm)
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b where b.nd=#{jhnd} and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm)
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b where b.hcjh_id=#{jhbh} and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm)
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b where (b.ZFRY_NAME1 like #{hcry}||'%' or b.ZFRY_NAME2 like #{hcry}||'%') and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm)
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b where b.hcjg=#{hcjg} and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm)
and xydm=#{xydm}
and hyfl=#{hyfl}
and QYMC like #{qy}||'%'
and zzxs=#{zzxs}
and jyzt=#{jyzt}
and hyfl=#{hyfl}
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b,t_hcjh c where b.hcjh_id=c.id and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm and c.jhmc like '%'||#{jhmc}||'%')
and exists(select 1 from t_hcrw b,t_hcjh c where b.hcjh_id=c.id and t_sczt.xydm=b.hcdw_xydm and c.gsjhbh =#{gsjhbh})
ORDER BY NAME
